hi velvet.

i've made some mistakes categorising my torrents. 

I've put my music albums in the audiobook category without knowing, because the translation in portuguese made me do the mistake. 

In portuguese is written 'audiocd' that make me understand full CD, and music, made me wrongly understand some kinda single music. 

Sorry. 

You have already modified one of my torrents, that i've put in audio>audiocd to audio>other [http://thepiratebay.se/torrent/7262037/Ed_Motta_-_2__amp_eacute__Demais_%281996%29]. 

So, can you help me with the other torrents i have that i've made the same mistake? 

Got to put them all to audio>music, and the audio>other one. Can you do that for me please? 

I thought i will help, but in the search people cant find my stuff, so sad. 

Thanks a lot from brazil,
